headline.main: Nazi Pincers Dent Moscow Line In North, but Tula Repels Blows; NAZI PINCERS DENT MOSCOW DEFENSES

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 20 -- The Russian line above Moscow appeared today to be bending back under the shock of one of a series of strong new German offensives all about the capital, but the southern Red Army anchor was reported holding firm at Tula against violent tank and infantry assaults.
abstract: German pincers dent Moscow line; Tula lines hold; German transports sunk by USSR ships, Arctic; German attempted encirclement of USSR forces checked, Kalinin and Volokolamsk areas
